resources.string: lock layout description to be used a unique id to lock screen
Plauncher promises to use lock screen permission responsibly. Plauncher does not collect or share any data.
1. Swipe up for all apps\n2. Long press anywhere for settings
Tip: Start typing an app name to auto-launch it
Tip: Our About page has answers to all your questions. Don\'t forget. :) \n\nThank you.
Hi, you won\'t see this message again. \n\nIf you like Plauncher, could you please give us a 5-star rating? It helps us improve our ranking and makes us very happy. Thank you!

Hi, we have a big request! We want to hit a million downloads before 2023 ends, and we need your help. \n\nCould you share Plauncher with your friends, please? That would be really helpful. Thank you!
Hi, keyboard is the fastest way to find and launch apps in Plauncher. Can we request you to keep this On for a few more days and then decide? \n\nThe choice is always yours.
The accessibility permission is required to enable double tap to lock. Any data acquired by Plauncher via this service will not leave your device.
Support Plauncher for free by using our Amazon affiliate link.
Every time you buy something using our link, we get a small commission. Please save the link and use it whenever you shop online.\nThank you!
Please set Plauncher as your default launcher first
Tip: Start typing for app RENAME option
Note: Tap on \'Plauncher\' at the top of this Settings page to find your hidden apps.\n\nMore details available in our About page below.

Please turn on or off Plauncher\'s accessibility service in your device\'s settings to enable or disable this feature. \n\nPlease note that this service is only used to let you turn off your device\'s screen using the double tap gesture. Our accessibility service does not collect or share any data.
Please turn on double tap to lock
Plauncher failed to lock device.\nPlease check your app settings.
Type a new app name first
Search for Launcher or Home app
Plauncher is not default.\nDaily wallpaper update may fail.
Are you using your phone, or is your phone using you?
